announcement_collection.body:
Dear Users,

Due to some network related issue, assignment tab of courses is taking quite some time to load. We have contacted the network team & they are looking into it. We'll update /  remove this message accordingly.
announcement_collection.title: Assignment Tab Issue

announcement_collection.body:
Important Notice for Islamabad Campus Only: 

We would like to inform you that we are transitioning to a Internet authentication system. As a result, it is essential for you to obtain the passwords associated with your user IDs for your respective domains. Without this authentication, you will not be able to access the internet in the C Block (Initially).

You can obtain your passwords from any IT labs or the Help Desk at A Block Reception.
announcement_collection.title: Important Notice for Islamabad Campus Only
announcement_collection.entityTitle: Important Notice for Islamabad Campus Only
